name: Road Fist
description: Road Fist is a Beat 'em up style action game inspired by classic 80's / 90's fighting movies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit Only) Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX 6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 Ti 1GB / AMD HD 6950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
